name: Learn Unity
tagline: Unity project examples for the book Learn Unity 4 for iOS Game Development
body:
![book cover](http://www.fugutalk.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/9781430248750-1.jpg)

This is the GitHub page for the upcoming book, Learn Unity 4 for iOS Game Development.
 
The GitHub projects, built up cumulatively through each chapter, do not include assets from the Unity Asset Store and Standard Assets that are used in the book,

The book and app demonstrate Unity graphics, audio and physics, scripting in JavaScript (and a little bit of C#), touch screen and accelerometer input, iAd banner and interstitial ads, Game Center leaderboard and achievements, complete bowling rules, and utilize free Asset Store packages:

The book also covers debugging, profiling and optimization, testing with the Unity Remote and iOS Simulator, build and App Store submission procedures

Technical review provided by Marc Sh√•rer of [Gayasoft](http://gayasoft.ch).

# Availability

The book is currently available as an [Apress alpha book](http://www.apress.com/9781430248750).

* [Amazon](http://www.amazon.com/Learn-Unity-iOS-Game-Development/dp/1430248750)
* [Barnes and Noble](http://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/learn-unity-4-for-ios-game-development-philip-chu/1113931582?ean=9781430248750)

Other sites:
* [Goodreads](http://www.goodreads.com/book/show/17063557-learn-unity-4-for-ios-game-development)

# Asset Store

The book utilizes free packages from the Unity Asset Store:

* [Eighteen Free Substances](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/1352) from [Allegorithmic](http://allegorithmic.com)
* [Free ArtskillZ Texture Pack 01](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/351) from [ArtskillZ](http://artskillz.net)
* [Skeletons Pack](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/1818) from [bisaniyehocam](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/publisher/645)
* [General Music Set](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/2589) from [Gianmarco Leone](http://gianmarcoleone.com/)
* [Free SFX Package](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/5178) from [Bleep Blop Audio](http://bleepblopaudio.com/)
* [Barrel](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/840) from [Universal Image](http://monstertruckherohd.com/)
* [iTween](http://itween.pixelplacement.com) from [Pixel Placement](http://pixelplacement.com)

# Support

Questions can be posted on the [Unity forum](http://forum.unity3d.com/threads/173210-Learn-Unity-for-iOS-Game-Development), any of my Facebook pages ([Technicat](http://facebook.com/technicatllc), [Fugu Games](http://facebook.com/fugugames) or [HyperBowl](http://facebook.com/hyperbowl)) and on [twitter](http://twitter.com/fugugames).

# Errata

I'm sure there will be some.

# Other Books

You may also be interested in Sue Blackman's [Beginning 3D Game Development with Unity](http://forum.unity3d.com/threads/93775-Beginning-3D-Game-Development-with-Unity/page17) (also from Apress), Will Goldstone's [Unity 3.x Game Development Essentials] (http://www.packtpub.com/unity-3-x-game-development-essentials-with-c-and-javascript-will-goldstone/book), and Jeff Murray's [Game Development for iOS with Unity3D] (http://www.crcpress.com/product/isbn/9781439892190).

# The App

The [HyperBowl](http://hyperbowl3d.com/)-style bowling game developed by following the book, complete with Asset Store assets and Unity Standard Assets, is [on the App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/app/learn-unity/id634845779 Learn Unity app).
